name: Park Wars
description:
In "Park Wars" the goal is to survive the waves of children trying to kill you with snowballs, by shooting them with yours.

This game was made in a Game Jam at our school by a team of three developers. The theme was Christmas, and we had 1 week to finish the game. With our beginner knowledge of video game development, this is what we came up with.

We hope you enjoy our game.
